text.autoconfig.stackable.option.onlyUns: Only add Stack size to Unstackable Items.
text.autoconfig.stackable.option.onlySta: Only add Stack size to Stackable Items.
text.autoconfig.stackable.option.forceSt: Force the Stack size to every Item without excuses.
text.autoconfig.stackable.option.turnWar: Turn off any warning from Mods.
